alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of northwestern Putnam and southeastern Clay Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 721 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower capable of producing a landspout over Florahome, or 9 miles north of Interlachen, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bostwick, Bardin, George`s Lake, Florahome and Carraway. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
